name: 12Games12Weeks - 12 - RTS
description:
RTS for my 12 Games in 12 Weeks Challenge. Making 12 Minimal Viable Product level games in 12 weeks.

Challenge information here: https://12games12weeks.blogspot.com/

Controls:

  • Keyboard/mouse:
    • left click - select unit
    • left drag - box select units
    • right click - set travel location
    • left click empty location - deselect all
    • WASD or Arrow keys - move screen
    • Mouse Screen edge - move screen
